title: Evelynn looks great in the Free Champ Rotation Tab.....
body:
http://i.imgur.com/uZDxtYH.png

Really brings out her features.... 

(Seriously fix this)

replies.body: This is a known issue, and we're working on a fix. :) In the future, please report this in the Report a Bug section of the boards.
Are you guys also aware of the mastery emote not working?

So to confirm this hasn't been removed? it just a bug??#

I like to show off that i have achieved rank 5 with a certain champion! :O
I mean, that's all everyone saw when they spotted the new splash art.
